dmca.title: Swiss Bank Account Company Follow-up Complaint (#2)
dmca.body:
Lausanne, February 2004

Micheloud & Cie

www.micheloud.com

Sent via			:Federal Express and by email.
Concerning			:Infringement of copyright notification
Original website		:www-swiss-barik-accourits.com
Infringing website	:	 www.swiss-banks-online.com

Sir,

I am a Swiss lawyer and a partner of Micheloud & Cie, a Swiss company incorporated in Lausanne, Switzerland.

On December the 5th we had written you to notify you of a copyright infringement and fraudulent promotion of service on the website www.swissgates.com which was listed on GoogleAdwords.

In our letter we explained how www.swissgates.com had copied client testimonials from, our website and faked them so that they looked like real client testimonials from www.swissgates.com.

Following to our letter www.swissgates.com removed the fake testimonials.

We were thus quite surprised to see that GoogleAdwords still advertises for www.swissgates.com. Even more surprising, we discovered that Google also links to a mirror of the original www.swissgates.com website, 
www.swiss-banks-online.com that contains the very same fake testimonials we wrote you about in December.

If you look on Google with the words: Swiss-banks-online

Google directly links to the page: 
http://www.swiss-banks-online.com/accountl.html 
http://www.swiss-banks-online.com/account2.html
http://www.swiss-banks-online.com

This website~ infringes our copyrighted work. The website www.swiss-bankaccounts.com has been created in January 2001. The infringing website www-swissbanks-online.com had its domain name registered in August 2003.

The copyrighted works at issue are the original texts that appear on our website on:
1.  http://swiss-bank-accounts.com/e/index.html
2.  http://swiss-bank-accounts.com/e/banking/main.html
3.  http://swiss-bank-accounts.com/e/testimonials/index.html
4.  http://swiss-bank-accounts.com/e/banking/accounts/swiss-postal-account.html

Infringements:
1.	The homepage of http://www.swiss-banks-online.com (exhibit 1A) contains direct cut and paste copy of the text on our home page http://swiss-bank-accounts.com/e/index-html (exhibit 1B).

2-	The description of the "postal. account" on www.swiss-banks-online.com (exhibit 2A) is also cut and pasted from our description on 
http://www.swiss-banks-online.com/e/banking/main.html (exhibit 2B).

3.	The client testimonials given on the left frame of the pages www.swiss-banks-online.com, www.swiss-banks-online.com/account2.html, http://www.swiss-banks-online.com/account1.html, http://www.swiss-banks-online.com/faqs.htm, (exhibit 3A) are cut and pasted from our real clients testimonials on http://swiss-barnk-accounts.com/e/tesfimonials/index.html (erhibit 3B). The "testimonial listed as "Westchester, New York USA" is a copy of our real testimonial from "CEO, USA" . The one from "Newcastle-upon-Tyne, England" is copied from our real "IT consultant Manchester, UK", the one from "Buenos Aires, Argentina" is a copy ftom our "Agricultural engineer, Guinea
